titleInfo.title: J. Michael Halford Computer Laboratory Dedication Ceremony

mods.abstract: At the dedication of the Computer Laboratory, speakers were President Brother Theodore Drahmann; Ray House, Dean of the School of Buseinss; and Michael Halford. Frank Salvaggio, Floyd Chandler, Jerry Grilli, and Michael Halford hung the dedication plaque; and Father Gabrial DiFederico blessed the site.
